channel.title: Fun with light and colour
channel.description: [IMG]http://sanga2.ismywebsite.com/ShineLineSparks.png[/img] in retrospect i shouldve done it bigger because personally i like it and think it wouldve made a cool desktop background :P However what do you think? the only bit im unsure about are the sparks i think i may have gone slightly over the top

more just using light and colour to get different effects and so on, i used photobucket because it automatically resizes the image otherwise the image is too grainy the full size for exmaple you can see
